title: Vue Boolzap
description: Single page project created completely inspired by the Whatsapp application. It can adapt to three different view (mobile, medium and web) and it's very interactive. Every chat contains a different topic and messages. It's also possible to interact with the user in the chat. Unfortunately it will only say 'Ok" ( : / )

title: Vite Boolando
description: The project is a single static page which is inspired to the famous e-commerce Zalando. Each model preview switch image on the hover.

title: Vite Boolflix
description: This project uses the "MovieDB" API to make a request and show on page a lookalike of the famous streaming platform Netflix. Each card shows information about the movie (title, language, description and rating)

title: PHP Object - Oriented Programming
description: The project where I developed the concept of Object -Oriented Programming. The page show various cards, including movies, tv-shows and also comics. Eeach card has a footer where are contained the main info about the product.

title: Laravel Comics
description: The first project of mine where I implement the framework Laravel, which allowed me to combine the front-end and back-end skills to build a multi-page application. It has 3 main section: the homepage, the movies section and the comics section.

title: Laravel Migration Seeder
description: A project created through the use of a local database where the information were requested through a Model Controller. It has three main section: Home page, where to choose between today or tomorrow departures; today section where it shows one row for each departing train showing  the information a passenger needs to know; and then the tomorrow section, perfectly similar but for the next day departures

title: Laravel DC Comics
description: First work of mine where I implement the four operations: CRUD(  Create, Read, Update, and Delete). The application beside showing a list of cards of comics, gives the user the possibility to create a new one, edit an existing one or delete it.

title: Deliverboo
description: Developed a full-stack application in a team of 5 developer, inspired to Deliveroo. It features the entire web-flow of ordering from a restaurant and the payment process implemented using Braintree.

title: React Portfolio
description: A React.js application that integrates with a Laravel API backend to display dynamic projects. Includes routing and state management.

title: Laravel API
description: A Laravel API backend developed to manage projects and technologies. Includes git remote add origin https://github.com/nicodellolio/portfolio-react-static.gitauthentication, validation, and model relationships.

title: Lean People App
description: A JavaScript application for agile management of personnel. A private project with a focus on lean methodologies.

title: Alice System
description: A JavaScript tourist application to guide guests of a restaurant to personalized travel itineraries.
